## Watcher.enhanceDebugger() method

Call this function to enhance the debug experience in the Chrome DevTools

You need to open "Enable custom formatters" in your DevTools settings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static enhanceDebugger(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
